name: ListEnvironmentDatasets
description:
Retrieve datasets for a specified project environment.

This tool retrieves a list of datasets associated with a specified project environment within Datadog. It should be called when you need to view datasets for a particular project's environment.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project to access. Retrieve the ID by calling /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: dataset_ids
parameters.description: List of dataset IDs to filter results. Provide multiple IDs separated by commas.

value_schema.description: Multiple values may be separated by commas.

parameters.name: results_limit_per_page
parameters.description: Specifies the number of datasets to return per page. This is used to control pagination and manage the volume of data retrieved in a single call.

value_schema.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: results_start_index
parameters.description: The initial index to start returning datasets from, for pagination purposes.

value_schema.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.name: ordering_criteria
parameters.description: Specify the ordering of the dataset results. Options include `created_at`, `-created_at`, `updated_at`, `-updated_at`. Multiple criteria can be provided as a list.

value_schema.description:
Ordering

* `created_at` - Created At
* `-created_at` - Created At (descending)
* `updated_at` - Updated At
* `-updated_at` - Updated At (descending)

parameters.name: search_terms
parameters.description: Search terms to filter datasets by name, description, or metadata.

value_schema.description: Search in name, description, or metadata

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id__in
parameters.description: Multiple values may be separated by commas.

value_schema.description: Multiple values may be separated by commas.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

value_schema.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

value_schema.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description:
Ordering

* `created_at` - Created At
* `-created_at` - Created At (descending)
* `updated_at` - Updated At
* `-updated_at` - Updated At (descending)

value_schema.description:
Ordering

* `created_at` - Created At
* `-created_at` - Created At (descending)
* `updated_at` - Updated At
* `-updated_at` - Updated At (descending)

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in name, description, or metadata

value_schema.description: Search in name, description, or metadata

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
